name: Toy Destroyer
description:
Toy Destroyer

Story

The game is a Scenario created by a small kid in his the characters and assets are his toys and he is just making them fight and suddenly he turn into the a Main Character and the goes on the game.

Game Type

The game is a more of a puzzle adventure .

So have made few Significant changes such as :-

1. Created unique levels.

2. New stronger Enemies (differed by skins)

3. A lava platform ,When fallen on It kills you in an instant

4 . New InGame UI

5.  Enemies drop keys after Dying 

6. Created Teleportation feature(Level3)(Note : The feature is working but a bit glitchy , So if you want to test it out and does work ,Then just roam through it In and Out and you will be teleported)

Note: In level one  There is  a point where the player has to depend on the enemy to make the game move forward(The player has to jump in Front  of a destroyable vent to make the enemy break it with a bullet.)
